text: This was the first edition of the tournament since 2008. Matthew Ebden won the tournament defeating Denis Kudla in the final, 6–7(4–7), 6–4, 7–6(7–5). Matthew Ebden, 2015 men's singles champion ==Seeds== # Luca Vanni (First round) # James Ward (First round) # Ryan Harrison (Quarterfinals) # Denis Kudla (Final) # Yoshihito Nishioka (Quarterfinals) # Jared Donaldson (Second round) # Yuki Bhambri (First round) # James McGee (Semifinals) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Aegon Surbiton Trophy - Men's Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 Aegon Surbiton Trophy – Men's Singles
